[[File:GRM40 Redstone Monstrosity.webp|thumb|Redstone Monstrosity Hot Wheels car.]]
From 2017 to 2022, the toy brand {{w|Hot Wheels}} released a special line of cars based on [[Minecraft]] characters as part of their [https://hotwheels.fandom.com/wiki/Character_Cars Character Cars] series, namely the [[Creeper]], [[Enderman]], [[Skeleton]], [[Iron Golem]], [[Spider]] and [[Zombie]]. In 2020, a new car was added to the roster featuring the [[Ocelot]], and, in 2021, another new car was released, featuring the [[Minecraft Dungeons:Redstone Monstrosity|Redstone Monstrosity]] from [[Minecraft Dungeons]].

Between 2016 and 2018 there were also several Minecraft-themed Hot Wheels track sets featuring cars resembling Minecraft minecarts containing mobs and players.

=== 2022 ===
These three character cars came in a mixed case along with cars from [https://hotwheels.fandom.com/wiki/Sonic_the_Hedgehog_Character_Cars Sonic the Hedgehog] and [https://hotwheels.fandom.com/wiki/SpongeBob_SquarePants_Character_Cars SpongeBob SquarePants].  All three carry repeat toy #'s.  They were made in Thailand.

==Minecarts==
A series of Minecart cars also exists, designed to be compatible with [[Mini figures]]. Several models with different colors and designs have been produced.<ref>https://hotwheels.fandom.com/wiki/Minecart</ref>
